Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
activated \activated\ adj. 1. (Sewage treatment) treated with aeration and bacteria to aid decomposition; -- of sewage [WordNet 1.5]
3. (Physics) made reactive or more reactive; -- of e.g. a molecule
Syn: activated, excited [WordNet 1.5]
4. rendered active; -- as e.g. radioactive or luminescent or photosensitive or conductive
Syn: activated [WordNet 1.5]
5. (Military) set up and placed on active assignment a newly activated unit
Syn: activated [WordNet 1.5]

activated adj 1: (of sewage) treated with aeration and bacteria to aid decomposition 2: of e.g. a molecule; made reactive or more reactive [syn: {excited}] 3: rendered active; e.g. rendered radioactive or luminescent or photosensitive or conductive 4: set up and placed on active assignment; "a newly activated unit"
